snippet.title: Vexlands | Demo Available Now!
snippet.description:
Wishlist Vexlands on Steam: [ https://apo.gg/Vexlands ] 
Vexlands is a realm of surprises. Every newly opened space brings a surprise: loot, resources, dungeons, monsters & disasters! Build your village where you craft new equipment before you explore uncharted areas, and find relics that explain who came before and why these lands are cursed.

Follow Vexlands Twitter: ► http://twitter.com/VexlandsGame
Follow Vexlands Instagram: ► http://instagram.com/VexlandsGame

DISCORD: ► https://discord.gg/apogee
TWITTER: ► https://twitter.com/apogee_ent
INSTAGRAM: ► https://www.instagram.com/apogeeentertainment/
FACEBOOK: ► https://www.facebook.com/ApogeeEnt/
TIKTOK: ► https://www.tiktok.com/@apogeeentertainment

Video Credits:

Directed by: Jeron Moore & Kyle Blessing
Produced by: Scott Miller, Jeron Moore, Primož Vovk & Haydn Steffes
Edited by: Kyle Blessing
Trailer Music Composed by: Wayne Strange
Special Thanks: Brian Costa

#Apogee #Vexlands #VexlandsGame
